autoUpdate.updateAvailable:
There is a new version of the app available.
Downloading now ...
autoUpdate.updateDownloaded:
The new version has been downloaded and it will be installed automatically when you close the app.
Do you want to install it now instead?

browserNotification: Recommended browser for this concept is Chrome
conceptDescription: Join time travels and explore the book that can answer every question

answers: You must log in with your Portal user to be able to download the films.
You can request access by sending an email to hello@biblekids.io
The files are stored in the cache on your PC, and you can play them from the website even if you aren’t online.

Open the website somewhere with Wi-Fi access, download the chapter, and keep the browser open on your PC. When you come to the place where you want to run the website, open your PC again, use the same browser, and the films will be played on the website.
Have you opened the page in Chrome? That is the recommended browser for Explorers.
questions: I can’t download the films – what do I do?
I have logged in with my Portal user, but I still can’t download the films.
I have downloaded the chapter, but I can’t find the files – why?
I want to show the films at our church hall without Internet access – what must I do?
The page is unstable when I push buttons – what do I do?
I have a question that hasn’t been answered above – what do I do?

introduction: Now children aged 6-12 can join fantastic journeys in time and experience the Bible in a whole new way – with Explorers

bibleCards.message: Now it is time to get your bible cards.
bibleCards.title: Bible cards

pause.message: The children can take a break before the time travel continues.
pause.title: Part 1 completed

loginScreen.redirectInfo: You will be redirected to the login page.

completed.message: You have successfully completed the task!
completed.title: Well done!

keyInteraction.start: Press any key to start a round
keyInteraction.tryAgain: Press any key to try again

failed.message: You've played the wrong note of the melody!
failed.title: Oops!

timeElapsed.message: Time is up; try to attach all the wires before time is up.
timeElapsed.title: Oops!

notAvailable: No chapter available in the selected language

availableOffline.info: The chapter is now available offline with the tasks and films. You can now play it in a location without internet.
availableOffline.title: Available offline

download.info: Are you logged in? If so, you can complete the chapter without internet. Click here to make the chapter available offline.
download.title: Get offline version

downloadApp.infoText1: If it shows an item labeled "Chip" followed by chip name, it is "Mac with Apple silicon".
downloadApp.infoText2: If it shows an item labeled "Processor" followed by processor name, it is "Intel-based Mac".
downloadApp.title: Download Bible Explorers desktop app

offline.downloadFailed: There was a problem with downloading the chapter!
offline.downloadToContinue: You need to download the chapter to continue.
offline.outdated: The chapter has been updated. Please redownload to get the latest updates for best performance.
offline.redownloadConfirmation: Are you sure you want to redownload the chapter?

settings.noAccess: You don't have access to watch the films. To get access send an email to hello@biblekids.io
settings.title: Settings

status.noCacheNoInternet: We're very sorry but it looks like we couldn't find the chapters and you are not connected to the Internet.
